name: CHROMATIC ABERRATION (itch)
description:
A simple FPS game, made with Unity! Fight your way through 16 unique waves to reach the goal! 

Controls: Standard WASD + Mouse FPS controls. Press ESC to change mouse sensitivity, FOV, and y-inversion.

Features:

- 16 Enemy waves with 5 enemy types.

- 4 weapon types, each with single and gatling variations.

- Fast-paced FPS action.
